Unte iþ in Twrai jah Seidonai waurþeina mahteis þozei waurþun in izwis, airis þau in sakkum jah azgon sitandeins gaïdreigodedeina.
LUKE 10.14 sweþauh Twrai jah Seidonai sutizo wairþiþ in daga stauos þau izwis.
LUKE 10.15 jah þu Kafarnaum, þu und himin ushauhido, und halja gadrausjaza.
LUKE 10.16 saei hauseiþ izwis, mis hauseiþ, jah saei ufbrikiþ izwis, mis ufbrikiþ;
iþ saei ufbrikiþ mis, ufbrikiþ þamma sandjandin mik.
LUKE 10.17 gawandidedun þan sik þai sibuntehund miþ fahedai qiþandans:
frauja, jah unhulþons ufhausjand unsis in namin þeinamma.
LUKE 10.18 qaþ þan du im:
gasaƕ Satanan swe lauhmunja driusandan us himina.
LUKE 10.19 sai, atgaf izwis waldufni trudan ufaro waurme jah skaurpjono jah ana allai mahtai fijandis, jah waihte ainohun izwis ni gaskaþjiþ.
LUKE 10.20 sweþauh þamma ni faginoþ, ei þai ahmans izwis ufhausjand:
iþ faginod in þammei namna izwara gamelida sind in himinam.
LUKE 10.21 inuh þizai ƕeilai swegnida ahmin Iesus jah qaþ:
andhaita þus, atta, frauja himinis jah airþos, unte affalht þo faura snutraim jah frodaim jah andhulides þo niuklahaim.
Jai, atta, unte swa warþ galeikaiþ in andwairþja þeinamma.
jah gawandiþs du siponjam seinaim qaþ:
LUKE 10.22 all mis atgiban ist fram attin meinamma, jah ni ƕashun kann ƕas ist sunus, alja atta, jah ƕas ist atta, alja sunus, jah þammei wili sunus andhuljan.
LUKE 10.23 jah gawandiþs du siponjam seinaim sundro qaþ:
audaga augona, þoei saiƕand þoei jus saiƕiþ.
LUKE 10.24 qiþa auk izwis þatei managai praufeteis jah þiudanos wildedun saiƕan þatei jus saiƕiþ jah ni gaseƕun, jah hausjan þatei jus hauseiþ jah ni gahausidedun.
LUKE 10.25 jah sai, witodafasteis sums ustoþ fraisands ina jah qiþands:
laisari, ƕa taujands libainais aiweinons arbja wairþa?
LUKE 10.26 þaruh qaþ du imma:
in witoda ƕa gameliþ ist?
ƕaiwa ussiggwis?
LUKE 10.27 iþ is andhafjands qaþ:
frijos fraujan guþ þeinana us allamma hairtin þeinamma jah us allai saiwalai þeinai jah us allai mahtai þeinai jah us allai gahugdai þeinai, jah neƕundjan þeinana swe þuk silban.
LUKE 10.28 þanuh qaþ du imma:
raihtaba andhoft;
þata tawei jah libais.
LUKE 10.29 iþ is wiljands uswaurhtana sik domjan qaþ du Iesua:
an ƕas ist mis neƕundja?
LUKE 10.30 andhafjands þan Iesus qaþ:
manna sums galaiþ af Iairusalem in Iaireikon jah in waidedjans frarann, þaiei jah biraubodedun ina jah banjos analagjandans...
...LUKE 14.9 þana aftumistan haban staþ.
LUKE 14.10 ak þan haitaizau, atgaggands anakumbei ana þamma aftumistin stada, ei biþe qimai saei haihait þuk, qiþai du þus:
frijond, usgagg hauhis.
þanuh ist þus hauhiþa faura þaim miþanakumbjandam þus.
LUKE 14.11 unte ƕazuh saei hauheiþ sik silba, gahnaiwjada, jah saei hnaiweiþ sik silban, ushauhjada.
LUKE 14.12 qaþ-uþ-þan jah þamma haitandin sik:

þan waurkjais undaurnimat aiþþau nahtamat, ni haitais frijonds þeinans nih broþruns þeinans nih niþjans þeinans nih garaznans gabeigans, ibai aufto jah eis aftra haitaina þuk jah wairþiþ þus usguldan;
LUKE 14.13 ak þan waurkjais dauht, hait unledans, gamaidans, haltans, blindans.
LUKE 14.14 jah audags wairþis, unte eis ni haband usgildan þus;
usgildada auk þus in ustassai þize uswaurhtane.
LUKE 14.15 gahausjands þan sums þizei anakumbjandane þata qaþ du imma:
audags saei matjiþ hlaif in þiudangardjai gudis.
LUKE 14.16 þaruh qaþ imma frauja:
manna sums gawaurhta nahtamat mikilana jah haihait managans.
LUKE 14.17 jah insandida skalk seinana ƕeilai nahtamatis qiþan þaim haitanam:
gaggiþ, unte ju manwu ist allata.
LUKE 14.18 jah dugunnun suns faurqiþan allai.
sa frumista qaþ:
land bauhta jah þarf galeiþan jah saiƕan þata;
bidja þuk,
habai mik faurqiþanana.
LUKE 14.19 jah anþar qaþ:
juka auhsne usbauhta fimf jah gagga kausjan þans;
bidja þuk,
habai mik faurqiþanana.
